alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Ottawa; Republic (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 8:53PM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR LOW HUMIDITY, STRONG WINDS, AND VERY DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 020, AND 034... ...RED FLAG WARNING IS CANCELLED FOR THE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 020, AND 034 THIS EVENING... The National Weather Service in Topeka has cancelled the Red Flag Warning for Tuesday evening. * WIND... Northwest winds sustained 15 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 30 MPH Wednesday. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity is forecast to range from 15 to 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
